ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
icu:
- '78'
libcurl:
- '8'
openssl:
- '3.5'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

name: duckdb-split

about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "duckdb" %}
{% set version = "1.4.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
    # (!!) Please also update the git used for OVERRIDE_GIT_DESCRIBE in the build scripts.
  - url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 43645e15419c6539bae6915ba397de6569e4a7ca0d502be95d653a78fdb0bece
    patches:
      - 0001-Dynamically-link-the-cli.patch
      - 0001-Make-extensions-prefix-free.patch

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
  host:
    - icu
    - openssl
    - libcurl

outputs:
  - name: libduckdb
    script: install-lib.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - openssl
        - icu
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libduckdb${SHLIB_EXT}
  - name: libduckdb-devel
    script: install-headers.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/include/duckdb.h
  - name: duckdb-cli
    script: install-cli.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - duckdb -version
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-builtin-extensions.sh
      requires:
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-json
    script: noop.sh
    # Empty placeholder package as this now built-in
    # We need to use the same dependencies as in the main build to make it work in cross-compilation
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - exit 0
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpcds
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-autocomplete
    script: noop.sh
    # Empty placeholder package as this now built-in
    # We need to use the same dependencies as in the main build to make it work in cross-compilation
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - exit 0
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpcds
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-httpfs
    script: install-extension.sh
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
        - openssl
        - libcurl
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-fts
    script: install-extension.sh
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
        - openssl
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpch
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-ducklake
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq

about:
  home: https://www.duckdb.org/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An Embeddable Analytical Database
  description: |
    DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
    fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
    install and easy to use.
  doc_url: https://duckdb.org/docs/index.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
    - janjagusch
    - flaviomartins
